permissions: Admins can update any bidder; broker members can update bidders for their broker.
validation_notes: Requires a bidder ID argument. At least one of --name or --is-self-for-broker must be provided. Name must be unique within a broker if changed. is_self_for_broker must be boolean; only one self bidder is allowed per broker (is_self_for_broker=true). Broker cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --is-self-for-broker
flags.description: Mark as the broker's self bidder
